item.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 23, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Jan 27, 23:00 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 23/03/2023 05:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured). 
Otherwise, clients who have not defined the aggregation will have their servers temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

Mar 9, 22:00 UTC

item.title: VPS - SBG6 - host1031730
item.description:
Mar 11, 02:46 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 11, 02:39 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host1031730

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for

item.title: [RBX2][NASHA] - tete-364
item.description:
Mar 10, 16:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/03/2023 16:35 UTC
End Time : 10/03/2023 16:41 UTC
Root cause : Hardware issue
Some pools were temporarily unreachable:
zpool-123723
zpool-123727
zpool-123729
zpool-123733
zpool-123866
zpool-125059
zpool-125818
zpool-126045
zpool-127182
zpool-127727
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
